title: 333: Jess is Verbally ATTACKED + Bekah has a NEW Boyfriend
itunes:title: 333: Jess is Verbally ATTACKED + Bekah has a NEW Boyfriend
description:
The Broads are back to chat about all the details of their weekend - aka holiday party drama! They discuss Jess’ dissolved lips, security at the party because LA has been declared “The Purge”, awkward run-ins with “frenemies”, Jess seeing Bekah rule the boundary game, Jess getting verbally attacked, insecurities for days, reveals of recent arguments with Evan and Gray, Bekah’s new boyfriend, boundaries with a crush in a monogamous relationship, and finally Jess reveals what happened the NEXT day in San Diego! 

 

**Listen to episode “Jess Gets Wasted at Bach Nation Event + The One that Got Away” to hear the first half of the San Diego story: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/331-jess-gets-wasted-at-bach-nation-event-the-one/id1441571050?i=1000544409332

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
